animeTitle: Uchuu no Kishi Tekkaman Blade OVA: Twin Blood
animeDescription: Twin Blood is an alternate version of Blade and Evil's first battle, with drastically different character and mecha designs from the rest of the series. Blade/D-Boy does not need Pegas to transform and the armor more closely resembles the Radam humanoids from Tekkaman Blade II.
animeRelated: ['Alternative version: Uchuu no Kishi Tekkaman Blade']
